Name: Quest for Runia
About the game: Aim and shoot magic cubes into 3D structures to pop cubes of the same color. Find the most effective way to solve the puzzle and earn three stars in each level. You have unlimited time, but only a limited amount of spells! You'll face very tricky levels, don't be fooled by the easy start... Features: Relaxing seated VR gameplay 165 levels with growing difficulty and boss levels Steam achievements Seven beautiful environments Special cubes with fun mechanics, e.g. Bomb – removes all cubes in the explosion radius Lightning bolt – removes all cubes in one direction Slime cube – will spread slime to neighboring cubes …and many more!
